title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 73: Featuring Blake Wheeler
description:
Winnipeg Jets captain Blake Wheeler joins the show this week to talk about his path to the NHL, the best/worst changes in the league since he joined, teenage sniper Patrik Laine, what it was like having to watch Boston win the Cup after being traded, how he kills time on the road, and much more. The guys also discuss the playoff races, the retiring Sedins, the controversial ‘no goal' in the FLA/NAS game, the Masters, and the usual potpourri.

 

 

 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
